title: Mr. Robot
quote: The world is a dangerous place, Elliott, not because of those who do evil, but because of those who look on and do nothing.

title: Mr. Robot
quote: A bug is never just a mistake. It represents something bigger. An error of thinking that makes you who you are.

title: Mr. Robot
quote: I never want to be right about my hacks, but people always find a way to disappoint.

title: Mr. Robot
quote: Hello, friend… I should give you a name… you’re only in my head.

title: Mr. Robot
quote: The concept of waiting bewilders me. There are always deadlines.

title: Hackers
quote: There is no right and wrong. There’s only fun and boring.

title: Hackers
quote: Mess with the best, die like the rest.

title: Hackers
quote: Hack the planet! Hack the planet!

title: Hackers
quote: We have no names. No business cards. Our job is to crash systems and crack the Nsa.

title: Hackers
quote: The four most-used passwords are love, sex, secret and God.

title: WarGames
quote: Greetings, Professor Falken.

title: WarGames
quote: A strange game. The only winning move is not to play. How about a nice game of chess?

title: WarGames
quote: Shall we play a game?

title: WarGames
quote: There’s no way to win. The game itself is pointless!

title: WarGames
quote: Goddammit, I’d piss on a spark plug if I thought it’d do any good!

title: Tron
quote: All that is visible must grow beyond itself, and extend into the realm of the invisible.

title: Tron
quote: End of line.

title: Tron
quote: That’s Tron. He fights for the users.

title: Tron
quote: On the other side of the screen, it all looks so easy.

title: Swordfish
quote: Misdirection. What the eyes see and the ears hear, the mind believes.

title: Swordfish
quote: Don’t confuse kindness with weakness.

title: Swordfish
quote: War? Who are we at war with? – Anyone who impinges on America’s freedom.

title: The IT Crowd
quote: Hello, IT. Have you tried turning it off and on again?

title: The IT Crowd
quote: 0118 999 881 999 119 725... emergency services.

title: The IT Crowd
quote: I’ll just put it here with the rest of the fire.

title: The IT Crowd
quote: Prepare to put mustard on those words, for you will soon be consuming them along with this slice of humble pie from the oven of shame.

title: The IT Crowd
quote: I’m not turning it up to eight, Moss! It’ll blow my cock off!

title: Live Free or Die Hard
quote: Hacker jerk‑off!

title: Live Free or Die Hard
quote: You just killed a helicopter with a car! – I was out of bullets.

title: Live Free or Die Hard
quote: On your tombstone it should read, ‘Always in the wrong place at the wrong time.’

title: Live Free or Die Hard
quote: You know what you get for being a hero? Nothin'. You get shot at, you get a little pat on the back… later, you get a nice cushy job at a firehouse.

title: Live Free or Die Hard
quote: You’re a Timex watch in a digital age.

title: Live Free or Die Hard
quote: I know I’m not as smart as you guys with all this computer shit. But, hey… I’m still alive, ain’t I?

title: Sneakers
quote: There’s a war out there, old friend… it’s not about who’s got the most bullets. It’s about who controls the information.

title: Sneakers
quote: The world isn’t run by weapons anymore… It’s run by little ones and zeroes. It’s all just electrons.

title: Sneakers
quote: My voice is my passport. Verify me.

title: Sneakers
quote: Everything in this world operates not on reality… but the perception of reality.

title: Sneakers
quote: I could have been in the NSA, but they found out my parents were married.

title: The Matrix
quote: You take the blue pill… you wake up in your bed and believe whatever you want to believe. You take the red pill… you stay in Wonderland, and I show you how deep the rabbit‑hole goes.

title: The Matrix
quote: No, Neo. I’m trying to tell you that when you’re ready, you won’t have to dodge bullets.

title: The Matrix
quote: Human beings are a disease, a cancer of this planet.

title: The Matrix
quote: Do not try and bend the spoon. That’s impossible. Instead, only try to realize the truth: there is no spoon.

title: The Matrix
quote: There’s a difference between knowing the path and walking the path.

title: The Matrix
quote: What is real? How do you define ‘real’?

title: The Matrix
quote: There’s something wrong with the world; you don’t know what, but it’s there, like a splinter in your mind… driving you mad.

title: Ghost in the Shell
quote: If we all reacted the same way, we’d be predictable. Overspecialize, and you breed in weakness. It’s a slow death.

title: Ghost in the Shell
quote: Can you offer me proof of your existence? How can you, when neither modern science nor philosophy can explain what life is?

title: Ghost in the Shell
quote: DNA is nothing more than a program designed to preserve itself.

title: Ghost in the Shell
quote: All things change in a dynamic environment. Your effort to remain what you are is what limits you.

title: Ghost in the Shell
quote: There’s nothing sadder than a puppet without a ghost.

title: Ghost in the Shell
character: Major Motoko Kusanagi and Puppet Master
quote: The net is vast and infinite.

title: Ghost in the Shell
quote: If a technological feat is possible, man will do it… like it’s wired into the core of our being.

title: Antitrust
quote: This isn’t a game! In the real world, when you kill people they die—for real!

title: Antitrust
quote: We don’t take anything seriously, unless it’s on a hard drive.

title: Antitrust
quote: You’re either a one or a zero. Alive or dead.

title: Antitrust
quote: Someone somewhere will borrow your technology and use it to make a billion dollars.

title: Antitrust
quote: Dust the colon and the backslash key! Only geeks use those keys.

title: Antitrust
quote: The answer’s not in the box, it’s in the band.

title: Johnny Mnemonic
quote: I want to get online. I need a computer!

title: Johnny Mnemonic
quote: I can carry nearly eighty gigs of data in my head.

title: Johnny Mnemonic
quote: Information overload. All the electronics around you poisoning the airwaves.

title: Blackhat
quote: I did the crime; I’m doing the time. Time isn’t doing me.

title: Blackhat
quote: We both survived because we dedicated ourselves to our program. To hold onto who you are and not let go.

title: Blackhat
quote: I need more tangible than that. It’s called probable cause.

title: Blackhat
quote: Am I being tangible? Gary?

title: Blackhat
quote: To you this is just a game—the virtual world! You were never in the game.

title: The Net
quote: Our whole world is sitting there on a computer… It’s like this little electronic shadow on each and every one of us, just begging for someone to screw with.

title: The Net
quote: We’re sitting on the most perfect beach in the world, and all we can think about is—where I can hook up my modem?

title: The Net
quote: No one leaves the house anymore. No one has sex. The Net is the ultimate condom.

title: The Net
quote: What were you trying to do? Save the world? – No. Not the world, just myself.

title: Who Am I: Kein System ist sicher
quote: MRX has three rules: First: no system is safe. Second: aim for the impossible. Third: have fun in cyberspace and meat space.

title: Pirates of Silicon Valley
quote: You know how you survive? You make people need you. You survive because you make them need what you have. And then they have nowhere else to go.

title: Pirates of Silicon Valley
quote: Success is a menace. It fools smart people into thinking they can’t lose.

title: Pirates of Silicon Valley
quote: We’re better than you are! We have better stuff. – You don’t get it, Steve. That doesn’t matter!

title: Pirates of Silicon Valley
quote: You and I are both like guys who had this rich neighbor—Xerox—who left the door open… Only when you get there, you realize that I got there first. You’re too late.

title: Pirates of Silicon Valley
quote: Maybe fun is just fragments of existence with better packaging.

title: Pirates of Silicon Valley
quote: Good artists copy, great artists steal.

title: Pirates of Silicon Valley
quote: We’re here to make a dent in the universe. Otherwise, why even be here?
